definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
Liangzhu (c. 3400-2250 BC), neolithic culture of Changjiang delta
Mengzhu mountain range between south Hunan and Guangxi
Liangzhu (c. 3400-2250 BC), neolithic culture of Changjiang delta

sentences.english: It is Taozhu's Linhai Great Volcano.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是桃渚的臨海大火山。

sentences.english: While on his way to school, he met Nagisa.
sentences.chinese: 在一次上學的路上，他遇見了渚。

sentences.english: At the beginning of the school year, Tomoya meets Nagisa Furukawa, a soft-spoken girl.
sentences.chinese: 在學年一開始，朋也遇到了渚，一個柔弱的女孩。

sentences.english: 010 hold high the red flag, flying out of deep willow Houzhu.
sentences.chinese: 紅旗高舉，飛出深深楊柳渚。

sentences.english: Vast expanse of the water bank, on a lonely pier.
sentences.chinese: 茫茫水中渚，上有一孤墩。

sentences.english: On Saturday night, we went to the "Foreigners coffee shop'."
sentences.chinese: 星期六下午，我們一家人去了下渚湖。

definition: to wash/to rinse/any of three 10-day division of the month (during Tang dynasty)/Taiwan pr. [huan3]/also pr. [wan3]
